sn41.3:2.4: The Brahmajālasutta (DN 1). It is referred to by name at Kd 1:1.8.8 and Vb 17:21.3, and by the list of views, numbered sixty-three at Snp 3.6:42.1 and sixty at SN 8.2:5.1 = Thag 21.1:9.1.
sn41.3:4.13: According to the commentary, “substantialist view” (sakkāyadiṭṭhi) is the sixty-third view mentioned at Snp 3.6:42.1.
sn41.3:7.1: Citta consistently uses the honorific ayya rather than the standard āyasmā.
sn41.3:8.8: His reason for leaving is not explained. Perhaps he did not wish to be seen as a favorite of the famous supporter. See similar occurrences at SN 41.4:6.9 and AN 3.126:7.5
